section.title: sales orders list open List Open Sales Orders
section.para: A Sales Order appears on the List Open Sales Orders screen if one or more of its Line Items remains open. Once all Line Items for a Sales Order have been closed, the Sales Order will no longer appear on the list. Typically, Sales Order Line Items are closed when the Order is selected for billing. To display open Sales Orders by Site, select the "Open Sales Orders" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying open Sales Orders, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display a list of open Sales Orders for all Sites.
Specify Site whose open Sales Orders you want to display.
Select to automatically update the display every five minutes.
